price: благодат ће то да буде од твога Господара; то ће, заиста, да буде велики успех!
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbika dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
